DOC.brief_title: High Dose Intravitreal Ranibizumab Recalcitrant Radiation Retinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , Phase I study intravitreally administer ranibizumab subject radiation retinopathy . This single center , non-randomized , active treatment study involve 10 consecutive patient . This study evaluate safety tolerability high dose ( 2.0 mg ) intravitreal ranibizumab effect regression radiation retinopathy mean change visual acuity .

The following consider effective mean contraception : surgical sterilization use oral contraceptive , barrier contraception either condom diaphragm conjunction spermicidal gel , IUD , contraceptive hormone implant patch .
